text: Eadward cing gret wel Wulfwi biscop & Tosti eorl & Norðman scirrefe & ealle his witen & ealle his holden inne Hamtunescire hadede & leawede freondlice.
& ic cyðe eow þæt <Ælfwine> abbod of Ramesege & Leofric abbod of Burh habben me gecyd of þæt hwærf & of þa forewarde þe heo habben gespeken & gedon heom betweonan.
& ic wylle þæt ge understanden þæt Ælfwine abbod of Ramesege on þas wise hafð gehwærfd æt Leofrice abbod of Burh nigen gerde landes æt Ludintune of Sanctus Petrus socnelande of Burh.
Huntinges hide be name & Godrices twa gerde þe Densce, & Brandes gerde, & Leofgares gerde & Ælfwines gerde þe Blace scer & sacleas to fulle hwærfe wið æfric man ær dæige & æfter dæige.
& hafð gifen him þær fore þæt land æt Mærham al <ðæt> Sanctus Bendictus þær ahte, scer, & sacleas wið æfric man to fulle hwærfe.
& toæken þis þe abbod & þa gebroðra of Ramesege sculen gifan ælce gere feower þusend æl inne lenten to cariteð þon abbode & þam gebroðre in to Burh.

To þære forwarde þæt þe abbod & þa gebroðra of Ramesege sculen habben of Sanctus Petrus landare wercstan æt Bernace, & walstan æt Burh, alswa mycel swa heom behofeð to fulle forewarde scer & sacleas wid toll & wid ealle þing be wætere & be lande in to Ramesege æfre mare.
& heo habben me gecyd þæt þis forewarde wæs imaked on Leofsies abbodes iwitnesse of Eli, & Wulfgeates abbodes of Crulande, & on þære manne þe heom mide wæren.
Nu cyðe ic eow þæt Ælfwine abbod hafð swa wið me gespeken & of his me igefen þæt ic habbe þis ilce forewarde igeated.
& ic wille þæt hit stande al swa heo hit gespeken habbeð Gode to lofe, & Sancta Maria, & Sancte Benedihte æfre mare wið borene & wið unborene.
& ic hate & beode þæt nan man ne wurðe swa deorf ne swa dyrsti þæt þis ilce hwærf & þis ilce forwarde breke, haded ne leawed.
& ic forbeode be fulle wite þæt nan man ne wurðe swa dyrsti, þæt Sanctus Benedihtus men ne heore þing nahwær ne derie, ac Godes grið & min habben heo & heore þing be wætere & be lande.
& ic hæte & beode mid þis ilce writ, þæt þæt ilce mærke & mære æfter Cnutes delfe kinges stande alswa Ælfwine abbod of Ramesege hit betalde wið Siwarð abbod of Þornege.
Æl beo þe Gangestyde be east halfe þam dælue, & be west halfe be Hyndelake swa anan to Wendelesmere & healf Ragereholt in to Ramesege.
On Leofsies abbodes iwitnesse of Eli, & on Leofrices abbod of Burh, & Wulfgeates abbod of Crulande, & þare manne þa heom mide wæren.
& gif æniman þis ilce forewarde mid ænige þinge abreke, & awansige, si he gesyndred fram <heofenerices> myrhðe butan he hit ibete ær he heonan gewite.
Þis writ wæs imaked æt Westmunstre on Sanctus Petrus mæssedæi on Stigandes iwitnesse ercebiscopes, & Edwines abbodes, & Haroldes eorles, & Esegares stalres, & Hugelines burðeines.
